page.title: 05SOUTH NORMANTON 12.00_8.30am
page.content: At 12.00 we are sleeping silently but sometimes we go to bed late.If we do then it is hard to get up the following morning.We usually get up early at 6.30.We watch television for a while and soon we have our breakfast and a cup of tea.We then have a wash and brush our teeth and get ready for school. When we are ready we play games on our computers.There are many games that we like such as: Galaxy,Testmatch,Zap,Zaxxon,Bonkey,Gho stbusters,Hunchback,Radar Rat Race and Donkey Kong. After playing on the computer we get our sandwiches ready and pack our bags with our P.E. kit.We like P.E. because we play football,horse and jockey and ball throwing but we like rounders best of all. When we're ready we set off for school
